title: The Ophthalmic Group - Type ID
content:
I need help identifying the (tortured) type used in this logo.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204121013im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ophthalmic_center_4896.jpg)

 [‹ "Funk Ball" yo!](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204121013/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46805 "Go to previous forum topic") [Type ID would be greatly appreciated ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204121013/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46811 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Guerella

comments.content: it’s so smoooshed and stretched out I hardly recognized it. Thank you.
